definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to return in triumph/to return victorious
Yuan Shikai (1859-1916), senior general of late Qing, subsequently warlord and self-proclaimed emperor of China
Kaili city in Guizhou, capital of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南苗族侗族自治州|黔东南苗族侗族自治州
McCain (name)/John McCain (1936-2018), US Republican politician, Senator for Arizona 1987-2018

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，馬凱國務委員成功訪問歐盟總部。

sentences.english: Kekule reported his discovery to a meeting of scientists.
sentences.chinese: 凱庫勒在一次科學家會議上報告了他的發現。

sentences.english: Kay plays chess better than Paul.
sentences.chinese: 凱比比保羅下棋下得好。

sentences.english: Kiah and Rilla walked back to the taxi.
sentences.chinese: 凱和瑞拉回到出租車那兒。

sentences.english: And then he looked up,first at Rilla and then at Kiah.
sentences.chinese: 之後他擡起頭看看瑞拉又看看凱。

sentences.english: Find Kelethin a bit too high up in the trees for your acrophobia ?
sentences.chinese: 覺得凱拉辛對有懼高症的你來說太高了嗎？

sentences.english: 'The farther your hand has to go from your body, the more burden there is on the upper extremities,' says Mr. Caffrey.
sentences.chinese: 凱弗雷說，你的手伸的越遠，承受的負擔越重。

sentences.english: And question number three, the basic idea of consent. Kathleen got us on to this.
sentences.chinese: 至於問題三，就是徵得同意的觀點，凱思琳提到的。

sentences.english: Of course, the 33-year-old Kerviel isn't employed at Société Générale.
sentences.chinese: 當然，今年33歲的凱維埃爾不再受僱於興業銀行。

sentences.english: We don't want our country to evolve into the banana-republic economy described by Keynes.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道美國會不會變成凱因斯所說的香蕉共和國。

sentences.english: Excuse me, but would you perhaps be Mr. Kay of Great Expectations Company?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，請問您是遠大前程公司的凱女士嗎？

sentences.english: That just about sums up the influence Reg Kay has had on greyhound racing in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 註冊凱只是影響了款項已在澳大利亞賽狗。

sentences.english: Betty Skelton did this while flying about three meters off the ground—upside down.
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂斯凱爾頓同時起飛下降約三米的地面，倒置。

sentences.english: 'Nothing's wrong with he satellite, ' Kiah answered quietly. 'It's AOL.
sentences.chinese: “衛星沒問題，”凱平靜地回答，“是人工臭氧層。”

sentences.english: Kelly also enjoyed a boat trip on the river Thames. Every day, she went to a different place and saw interesting things.
sentences.chinese: 每天，凱麗都去不同的地方，參觀有趣的東西。

sentences.english: This week in our series, Kay Gallant and Harry Monroe tell more about that period.
sentences.chinese: 這在我們的系列，凱門羅浩和哈利告訴周的任期。

definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
